title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When datetime values are retrieved from a table, they are displayed in different formats in the dynamic text item and data/text item.
EB: The datetime values should be displayed in the same format in both the dynamic text item and data/text item.
SR: To reproduce the issue:  1. Insert a text, data, or dynamic text item into a table.  2. Retrieve datetime values from the table in both the dynamic text item and data/text item.  3. Compare the formats of the datetime values in both places to see if they are different.
